pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Eigenvalues and QZ Decomposition // Generalized eigenvalues and QZ decomposition (generalized Schur form) for an N-by-N non-symmetric matrix A or paired matrices (A,B) with eigenvalues reordering mechanism. The package is mainly based complex*16 and double precision of LAPACK library (version 3.4.2.)
